title: Ballista sentry summons
summaries: The Ballista Rod, Cane, and Staff are special sentry summon weapons. They can summon the Ballista sentry, which lasts for 10 minutes, remains stationary, and does not count against the player's minion capacity. Each Ballista sentry is a large automated crossbow device on the ground that fires Ballista Shot projectiles at approaching enemies, piercing up to three of them. The Rod is sold by the Tavernkeep for 50000*5 [img:Defender Medal], the Cane for 150000*15 [img:Defender Medal], and the Staff for 600000*60 [img:Defender Medal].

The Rod is always available. The Cane becomes available after defeating one <linked>mechanical boss</linked>, and the Staff becomes available after defeating <linked>Golem</linked>. The three different versions cause an identical effect, but with varying statistics, with the Staff being the most expensive and the most powerful.

These weapons cannot be used outside of the <linked>Old One's Army</linked> <linked>event</linked> until the event has been successfully completed. Completing the event on any difficulty allows Rods, Canes, and Staves alike to be used outside of the event.

During the Old One's Army event, <linked>Etherian Mana</linked> can be collected, which allows the placement of multiple Ballistas that remain permanently until the event is over. Etherian Mana cannot be used outside the event.

Ballista sentries are boosted by the <linked>Squire armor</linked> and <linked>Valhalla Knight armor</linked> set bonuses, which increase the velocity of the Ballista Shot projectiles and allow them to pierce up to three more enemies, for a maximum of six. In addition, they grant the <linked>Ballista Panic!</linked> buff for 5 seconds when the player takes damage, which increases the sentries' fire rate. The Valhalla Knight armor also greatly increases the fire rate.

Their best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but these primarily affect the initial summon rather than the resulting sentry. Additionally, sentries cannot deal critical hits. The only lasting advantage a Mythical Ballista has over a Ruthless one is knockback.
